description:
Coinhub 空投卡，每周六 12 点开抢。
空投卡持卡人每周一至周五中午12:00，即可领取当天专属空投。（保底每天一场） 
Launch Coinhub APP on every Saturday, 12:00 P.M.and claim the CARD. 
From Monday to Friday, 12:00 P.M. every week, Cardholders can claim the exclusive airdrop on that day (at least one airdrop each day)
有效期（Valid period）：2021.09.20 ~ 2021.09.24
name: Coinhub Gift Card #05599
